mapper.insert: insert into projectadd (projectname, projectadministrator, region, projectdescription) VALUES (#{projectname}, #{projectadministrator}, #{region}, #{projectdescription})
insert into users (username, password, email, phone, role_id, created_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{role_id}, #{created_at})
INSERT INTO user_project (userid, projectid, role, joinedat) VALUES (#{userid}, #{projectid}, #{role}, #{joinedat})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.projectname, p.projectadministrator, p.region, p.projectdescription FROM projectadd p JOIN userproject up ON p.id = up.projectid WHERE up.userid = #{userid}
